SEARCH:
Package com.icx.dom.jdbc

Klasse SqlDbTable

java.lang.Object
com.icx.common.base.Common
com.icx.dom.jdbc.SqlDbTable
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Comparable<SqlDbTable>
public class SqlDbTable extends Common implements Comparable<SqlDbTable>
Objects of this class are associated to SQL database tables and contain table and column meta data.

SqlDbTable objects are created on registering database tables using SqlDb.registerTable(Connection, String) and can then be retrieved by table name using SqlDb.findRegisteredTable(String).

Table metadata is stored in fields of SqlDbTable, column metadata in fields of SqlDbTable.Column, SqlDbTable.ForeignKeyColumn, SqlDbTable.UniqueConstraint subclasses.

Provides also methods to inspect table and column reference structure of database getReachableTables(), reaches(SqlDbTable), getTablesWhichCanReach(), isReachableFrom(SqlDbTable), SqlDbTable.ForeignKeyColumn.reaches(SqlDbTable).
